summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6216 for the improvement of 12th Avenue Northeast from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; by widening the existing paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88585, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
